summary: I HAVE A FORD FOCUS 2000 THAT HAD A STALLING PROBLEM.  I WAS TOLD  THIS ISSUE WOULD BE A RECALL (IT WAS ALSO IN THE NEWSPAPER) AND SINCE IT WAS NOT I HAD TO SPEND 500.00 TO GET IT FIXED.  I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW HOW MANY OTHER COMPLAINTS YOU HAVE ABOUT A STALLING ISSUE WITH THESE VEHICLES.  I HAVE ALREADY HAD 5 RECALLS ON THIS CAR!! *JB
